body_text: The CheckboxGroup code I was using had pulled values from input and for some reason I thought it had to be passed as a whole object. I've removed this extra prop.
body: The `CheckboxGroup` code I was using had pulled values from `input` and for some reason I thought it had to be passed as a whole object. I've removed this extra prop.
body_html: The CheckboxGroup code I was using had pulled values from input and for some reason I thought it had to be passed as a whole object. I've removed this extra prop.
